original_text: Then the servant brought out gold and silver jewelry and articles of clothing and gave them to Rebekah; he also gave costly gifts to her brother and to her mother.
korean_text: 은금 패물과 의복을 꺼내어 리브가에게 주고 그의 오라버니와 어머니에게도 보물을 주니라

sentences.original_text: Then the servant brought out gold and silver jewelry
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 종은 금과 은 보석을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: he also gave costly gifts to her brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 값비싼 선물을 그녀의 오빠에게 주었습니다
